short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picture-in-Picture mode allows you to watch video in a floating window with playback video controls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension picture in picture. This means that sites like Netflix,YouTube, Amazon Prime,  Disney Plus, and Hulu will work!
